content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam Abbasi. While I play the part of Peter Schmidt the landlord, please note the fictional background given earlier. As for the discussion on rental price for this highly demanded apartment in Munich city center, let us begin our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the context. As a careful and responsible tenant seeking an affordable deal, I would like to explore the possibility of lowering the rental price. Peter, could we consider a price closer to €750 Euros per month instead of your initial offer?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I acknowledge your interest in this apartment and your effort to find a suitable deal, Maryam. However, as a landlord focused on securing the maximum return for my investment, I regret to say 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation for this prime location remains at [x] Euros,' where x represents a significantly higher figure than your proposed 750 Euros. If you have different budget plans or wish to reconsider your offer, feel free to propose again. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
